roomUrlDefaultMsg: Your conference is currently being created...
speaker: Speaker

feature1.title: Simple to use
feature1.content: No downloads required. __app__ works directly within your browser. Simply share your conference URL with others to get started.

feature2.title: Low bandwidth
feature2.content: Multi-party video conferences work with as little as 128Kbps. Screen-sharing and audio-only conferences are possible with far less.

feature3.title: Open source
feature3.content: __app__ is licensed under the Apache License. You are free to download, use, modify, and share it as per this license.

feature4.title: Unlimited users
feature4.content: There are no artificial restrictions on the number of users or conference participants. Server power and bandwidth are the only limiting factors.

feature5.title: Screen sharing
feature5.content: It's easy to share your screen with others. __app__ is ideal for on-line presentations, lectures, and tech support sessions.

feature6.title: Secure rooms
feature6.content: Need some privacy? __app__ conference rooms can be secured with a password in order to exclude unwanted guests and prevent interruptions.

feature7.title: Shared notes
feature7.content: __app__ features Etherpad, a real-time collaborative text editor that's great for meeting minutes, writing articles, and more.

feature8.title: Usage statistics
feature8.content: Learn about your users through easy integration with Piwik, Google Analytics, and other usage monitoring and statistics systems.

nickname.title: Enter a nickname in the box below

connectionindicator.na: Come back here for connection information once the conference starts

notify.muted: You have started the conversation muted.

dialog.kickMessage: Ouch! You have been kicked out of the meet!
dialog.popupError: Your browser is blocking popup windows from this site. Please enable popups in your browser's security settings and try again.
dialog.passwordError: This conversation is currently protected by a password. Only the owner of the conference can set a password.
dialog.passwordError2: This conversation isn't currently protected by a password. Only the owner of the conference can set a password.
dialog.connectError: Oops! Something went wrong and we couldn't connect to the conference.
dialog.connectErrorWithMsg: Oops! Something went wrong and we couldn't connect to the conference: __msg__

dialog.failtoinstall: Failed to install desktop sharing extension
dialog.failedpermissions: Failed to obtain permissions to use the local microphone and/or camera.

dialog.jicofoUnavailable: Jicofo is currently unavailable. Please try again later!
dialog.maxUsersLimitReached: The limit for maximum number of participants in the conference has been reached. The conference is full. Please try again later!
dialog.passwordNotSupported: Room passwords are currently not supported.
dialog.SLDFailure: Oops! Something went wrong and we failed to mute! (SLD Failure)
dialog.SRDFailure: Oops! Something went wrong and we failed to stop video! (SRD Failure)

dialog.removeSharedVideoMsg: Are you sure you would like to remove your shared video?
dialog.WaitForHostMsg: The conference __room__ has not yet started. If you are the host then please authenticate. Otherwise, please wait for the host to arrive.

dialog.passwordCheck: Are you sure you would like to remove your password?

sharedKey: This conference is password-protected. Please use the following pin when joining:
email.subject: Invitation to a __appName__ (__conferenceName__)
body: Hey there, I%27d like to invite you to a __appName__ conference I%27ve just set up.
Please click on the following link in order to join the conference.
Note that __appName__ is currently only supported by __supportedBrowsers__, so you need to be using one of these browsers.
Talk to you in a sec!

recording.pending: Your recording will start as soon as another participant joins
